backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores vitals readings (heart rate, BP, SpO2, temperature, respiratory rate) in a list with validation, and exposes methods to add real or simulated readings and query by date range or latest.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the SuggestionBox feature to its implementation files (Layout.tsx and SuggestionBox.tsx) with test ID and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of all frontend source files to one-sentence summaries, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend architecture.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, card, teal accents, status colors).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with a root layout route wrapping Dashboard, LogEntry, and History pages inside a React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell with sticky header, desktop/mobile navigation, autonomous monitoring status pill, and persistent SuggestionBox rendered below main page content above the footer.
frontend/src/components/SuggestionBox.ts: Persistent bottom bar displaying 12 rotating healthy activity suggestions that auto-advance every 18 seconds with a fade transition and a manual Next button, styled to match the dark teal medical theme.
frontend/src/components/VitalCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying a single vital sign with its value, unit, status badge (normal/warning/critical), reference range, and loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/VitalsAlertBanne: Defines a dismissible alert banner component for individual vitals warnings/criticals, and an AlertsContainer that renders a list of such banners.
frontend/src/components/VitalsTable.tsx: Renders a sortable table of vitals readings with color-coded status indicators for each vital sign and an overall status column.
frontend/src/components/VitalsTrendChart: Renders a Recharts line chart for a single vital sign over time, with optional reference lines for normal range boundaries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
Custom hook that automatically submits simulated vitals readings to the backend every 30 seconds and exposes monitor state including countdown and last-recorded time.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching the latest reading, all readings, date-range readings, and a mutation for adding new vitals readings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a medical-grade dark theme with OKLCH CSS variables, Tailwind base/utilities, custom card glow utilities, and font imports.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays the latest vitals reading as cards, shows autonomous monitoring status, and manages dismissible alerts for out-of-range vitals.
frontend/src/pages/History.tsx: History page that displays all vitals readings in a tabbed view with trend charts and a table, supporting optional date-range filtering.
frontend/src/pages/LogEntry.tsx: Form page for manually entering and submitting a vitals reading, with per-field validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/utils/vitalsSimulator.ts: Generates physiologically plausible simulated vitals readings by drifting values around a baseline with mean-reversion, returning nanosecond-timestamped readings.
frontend/src/utils/vitalsThresholds.ts: Defines normal/warning/critical thresholds for each vital sign and exports helper functions to evaluate a reading's status and retrieve reference ranges.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom color tokens (teal, navy, status), fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, version, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features for a 24/7 vitals monitoring app.
